content.eamr: ( ing-9 "1/2 cup white sugar for decoration" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a medium bowl, cream together the margarine and 1 cup white sugar until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "cream"@21:26 / AC
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a medium bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the margarine"@36:49 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "1 cup white sugar"@54:71 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until smooth"@72:84 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Beat in the egg and molasses until well blended.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Beat in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "the egg"@11:18 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "molasses"@23:31 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until well blended"@32:50 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Combine the flour, ginger, cinnamon, baking soda and salt; stir into the molasses mixture to form a dough.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "flour"@15:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "ginger"@22:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "cinnamon"@30:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "baking soda"@40:51 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "salt"@56:60 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "stir"@62:66 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "the molasses mixture"@72:92 / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-3-0 "to form a dough"@93:108 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Roll dough into 1 inch balls and roll the balls in the remaining sugar.
5) Place cookies 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "cookies"@9:16 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-5-0 "ungreased cookie sheets"@37:60 / TOOL )
		:heat ( "2 inches apart"@17:31 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "8 to 10 minutes"@12:27 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "the preheated oven"@31:49 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "removing"@62:70 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-7-0 "a wire rack"@74:85 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-7-0 "to cool completely"@86:104 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-7-1 "cool"@20:24 / AC
		:ppt ( "cookies"@9:16 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-7-1 "baking sheet"@28:40 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "5 minutes"@45:54 / DUR )
	)
)
